questions.question_text: Which option should be included in the data center design if it must support zone-based firewalling on a per virtual machine basis, while preserving full virtual machine mobility without manual intervention?

discussion.content: Correct answer should be "A". Since the question is about "zone-based FIREWALLING", it's "virtual firewall" (VSG). And vPath is the way how it communicates to Nexus 1000v.

choices.B: Cisco Nexus 1000v Advanced Edition with Prime Network Services Controller
choices.A: Cisco Virtual Services Gateway with vPath

questions.question_text: You are designing a large-scale, multitenant data center. Which two features provide each tenant with the ability to manage its own IP services at the aggregation layer? (Choose two.)

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: BDE
vPC is similar to Virtual Switch System (VSS) on the Catalyst 6500s. However, the key difference between vPC and VSS is that VSS creates a single logical switch. This results in a single control plane for both management and configuration purposes. Whereas with vPC each switch is managed and configured independently.

VSS appears as a "single switch", vPC runs on two separated switches.
VSS has a "single control plane", with vPC each switch runs individually.
VSS supports PAGP, vPC supports only LACP (or "static").

questions.question_text:
//IMG//
Which three items represent features of Cisco Virtual Port Channels? (Choose three.)

choices.F: channel protocols include Static, PAgP, PAgP+, LACP
choices.C: vPC appears as one switch to downstream switches
choices.D: vPC appears as two switches to downstream switch

choices.E: the SAN bandwidth used by the applications
choices.D: the memory resources used by the storage systems
choices.B: the number of physical CPU cores installed on the storage systems
choices.F: the CPU speed and utilization of the storage systems
choices.A: the storage capacity used by the applications
choices.C: the number of input/output operations per second used by the applications

questions.question_text:
You are assessing whether the storage system at a data center meets the needs of a customer.

Which three storage system parameters must you assess? (Choose three.)

discussion.content:
Correct answer: C
You must have an F Series module installed in your Cisco Nexus 7000 Series chassis in order to run FabricPath and conversational learning.
https://www.cisco.com/c/en/us/td/docs/switches/datacenter/nexus7000/sw/fabricpath/config/cisco_nexus7000_fabricpath_config_guide_8x/configuring-fabricpath-switching.html

choices.A: They use classical MAC learning by default.
choices.C: VLANs configured for FabricPath can exist only on F-Series line cards.
choices.D: The forwarding engine uses any M-Series line cards present in the switch for MAC proxy forwarding.
choices.B: FabricPath VLANs requires 802.1Q trunks for forwarding.

questions.question_text: Which statement about VLANs configured in FabricPath mode on a Cisco Nexus 7000 switch is true?
